thread.title: 5W Public Relations Opens Denver Office, Adds In-House Production Unit
thread.title_full: 5W Public Relations Opens Denver Office, Adds In-House Production Unit

title: 5W Public Relations Opens Denver Office, Adds In-House Production Unit
text:
Reprint NEW YORK , July 20, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- 5W Public Relations , one of the 20 largest independently owned public relations firms in the U.S., announced today the opening of a Denver office to support its growing client base in the Southwestern United States . The agency, which is projecting record-high revenue for 2015, announced further growth, adding an in-house production unit to complement its existing digital department. Driven by the firm's growing business in the digital marketing arena, the newly launched in-house production unit will work with clients on web and graphic design, video production, photography, packaging and branding needs both as stand-alone projects and as part of integrated communications campaigns. The agency's Denver office will work with clients in both the consumer and corporate space, managing integrated communications and PR campaigns. "It's an exciting time for 5W Public Relations," said Ronn Torossian , President & CEO of 5WPR. "We're continuing to grow and these expansions are the natural next step for us as an agency. As we've steadily increased our footprint both in Denver and within the digital marketing space, these moves make perfect sense for our team and our clients." About 5W Public Relations: 5W Public Relations is an award-winning, full-service firm known for innovative programs that engage with businesses, individuals and ideas. With over 120 driven professionals serving clients in industries spanning Beauty & Fashion, Consumer Brands, Entertainment, Food & Beverage, Health & Wellness, Travel & Hospitality, Technology, Nonprofit, Corporate Communications and Reputation Management, Public Affairs, Crisis Communications and Digital Strategy, 5W PR provides leading businesses a resourceful, bold and results-oriented approach to communications. 5W's creative campaigns, client results and exceptional team members have earned they agency multiple awards from industry organizations including PR Agency of the Year, PR Executive of the Year, Product Launch of the Year, Business to Business Program of the Year, Digital/Social Media Campaign of the Year and more. Press Contact:5W Public Relations Ronn Torossian l ronn@5wpr.com 212.999.5585 To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/5w-public-relations-opens-denver-office-adds-in-house-production-unit-300115528.html SOURCE 5W Public Relations Copyright 2011 PR Newswire.
